adText: Tegereza itike yawe ubu ugende neza!

bookOnline.title: Tegura itike ya bisi kuri internet
bookOnline.description: Tegura amatike ya bisi yawe vuba kandi neza uri aho ariho hose mu Rwanda, utagombye gutegereza umurongo.

trackBus.title: Kurikirana bisi yawe mu gihe nyacyo
trackBus.description: Menya aho bisi yawe iherereye mbere yo kugera ku gihagararo cyawe kugirango urugendo rugende neza.

easyUse.title: Byoroshye gukoresha ku mbuga zose
easyUse.description: Porogaramu yacu n’urubuga rwacu byakozwe ku buryo buri wese yabikoresha, yaba kuri mudasobwa, tablet cyangwa telefone.

footer.tagline: Gerageza urugendo rufite umutekano kandi ruryoheye mu Rwanda hose. Duhuza n’inzira zose ku buryo bwizewe kandi butanga icyizere.
footer.bookDescription: Bika intebe yawe kugira ngo ugire urugendo rwiza mu Rwanda hose.
footer.newsletterDesc: Iyandikishe kugira ngo ubone ibyihariye n’amakuru mashya y’ingendo.

services.sectionDescription: Fata itike, ukurikire imodoka, cyangwa utegure urugendo rwawe byoroshye ukoresheje online, offline cyangwa USSD.
services.bookTicketDesc: Tegura urugendo rwawe uhereye ku itike yihuse, ihuye n’ingendo zawe.
services.trackCarDesc: Reba aho imodoka yawe iri mu gihe nyacyo ukanamenya igihe igeze aho ugomba kujya.
services.onlineOfflineBookingDesc: Fata itike ukoresheje porogaramu yacu cyangwa aho tugurisha amatike.
services.ussdBookingDesc: Fata itike vuba ukoresheje code ya USSD kuri telefoni yawe.
services.bottomDescription: Duhanga uburyo bworoshye bwo gutegura urugendo rwawe, guhitamo imodoka, no kugura itike byihuse.

about.title: Serivisi y'Amabus Yizewe Cyane mu Rwanda
about.subtitle: Tuhuza imigi mu Rwanda yose hamwe n'ubwitwararike butinzwe, bworoshye kandi bwizewe. Menya itandukaniro ry'ingendo n'amabus agezweho hamwe na Aby Ticket.
about.description: Kuva twashinzwe, Aby Ticket yiyemeje gutanga serivisi idasanzwe y'amabus mu Rwanda hose. Dukoresha amabus agezweho kandi yitaweho neza, hamwe n'abashoferi b'inararibonye bashyira imbere umutekano wawe n'ihumure ryawe. Urusobe rwacu rwagutse ruhuza imigi mikuru harimo Kigali, Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, n'izindi.

safety.title: Umutekano Ubanza
safety.description: Amabus yacu yose agenzurwa buri gihe kandi akagenzurwa mu bijyanye n'umutekano. Abashoferi bacu b'inararibonye bahuguwe mu gutwara neza no kurinda abashyitsi.

punctuality.title: Gutaha ku Gihe
punctuality.description: Twubaha igihe cyawe. Amabus yacu ataha ku gihe cyagenwe, bikugirira neza ko ugera aho ugana igihe ukeneye. Gukurikirana mu gihe nyacyo bikubwira ibiri kugenda mu rugendo rwawe.

comfort.title: Urugendo Runoze
comfort.description: Wishimire intebe nini, imyuka ikonje, umusarani usukuye, n'imyidagaduro mu busi. Amabus yacu yagenewe ihumure ryawe mu ngendo ngufi n'izide.

locations.subtitle: Genda mu Rwanda Rwose
locations.title: Tugeza Ahantu Hose
locations.description: Tangura amatike y'imodoka z'amabasi z'umutekano, ziyoroheje kandi za bucuti ku mihanda yose y'igihugu.
locations.ctaDesc: Imodoka zirenga 50 buri munsi zerekeza Musanze, Rubavu, Huye n'ahandi.

hero.title: Genda mu Rwanda mu Buryohe & mu Nteguza
hero.subtitle: Tangura amatike uva mu mabasi yizewe — umutekano, vuba, kandi yizewe.

bookingProcess.title: Intambwe zoroshye zo gutanga itike rya bisi
bookingProcess.subtitle: Tanga itike rya bisi muburyo butatu bworoshye - ukoresheje urubuga rwacu, aplikasiyo ya mudasobwa, cyangwa ukoresheje kode ya USSD. Gutanga byihuse, byizewe kandi byoroshye.

choose.title: Hitamo Urugendo Rwawe
choose.content: Hitamo imigi yo gutaha no kugera, hitamo itariki n'igihe ukunda. Reba inzira zihari kuva Kigali kugera Musanze, Huye, Rubavu, n'ahandi. Gereranya ibiciro n'abashoramari ba bisi urenze ushake uburyo bukwiye.

book.title: Tanga Itike Ryawe
book.content: Rangiza gutanga itike ukoresheje urubuga rwacu, aplikasiyo, cyangwa ukanda *334# kuri USSD. Hitamo intebe yawe, ongeraho amakuru y'umugenzi, wishyure ukoresheje Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), karita, cyangwa amafaranga mu biro byacu.

travel.title: Genda Byoroshye
travel.content: Akira itike rya elegitoroniki rya SMS na imeri ako kanya. Erekana kode y'itike ryawe kuri sitasiyo ya bisi, injira muri bisi yawe, wishimire urugendo runoze. Kurikirana aho bisi yawe iri mu gihe nyacyo ukoresheje aplikasiyo yacu.

faq.subtitle: Ibibazo bikunze kubazwa
faq.title: Ibyo ukeneye byose kumenya ku booking ya tike
faq.a1: Ushobora kubona tike yawe kuri interineti, uhitemo aho uturuka n’aho ujya, igihe ushaka kugenda, hanyuma wishyure ukoresheje uburyo bwizewe.
faq.q2: Nshobora guhagarika cyangwa guhindura urugendo rwanjye?
faq.a2: Yego, ushobora guhagarika cyangwa guhindura urugendo rwawe nibura amasaha 24 mbere yo guhaguruka. Igihe cy’imihango myinshi bishobora kugira ingaruka.
faq.q3: Hariho igabanyirizwa ku banyeshuri cyangwa abakuru?
faq.a3: Yego, abanyeshuri n’abakuze bafite uburenganzira ku giciro gito. Ugomba kwerekana indangamuntu igaragaza icyiciro cyawe.
faq.q4: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura bwemewe?
faq.a4: Dufata amakarita yo kwishyura, Mobile Money, n’ubundi buryo bwemewe bwo kwishyura mu gihugu.
faq.a5: Oya, ntibisabwa gucapa. Ushobora kwerekana tike yawe ya telefoni igihe winjira mu modoka.

aboutUsPage.connectingCommunities:
Guhuza Imiryango y’u Rwanda
Binyuze mu Rugendo rw’Ibinyabiziga byizewe

vision.title: Icyerekezo Cyetwe
vision.heading: Kuyobora Impinduramatwara mu Itwara ry’Abagenzi mu Rwanda
vision.description: Yashinzwe mu 2018, Aby Ticket ifite icyerekezo cy’u Rwanda aho ingendo z’amabisi zoroshye kandi zirambye zihuriza hamwe buri gice cy’igihugu. Dukurikije Icyerekezo 2050, tugamije gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho nk’imodoka zifashisha amashanyarazi n’ubwikorezi bushingiye ku buhanga kugira ngo ingendo hagati y’imijyi zibe nziza, zifite isuku kandi ziboneke kuri bose — Abanyarwanda n’abashyitsi.

points.nationwide: Ibyerekezo byose mu gihugu bitwara abagenzi barenga 50,000 buri kwezi
points.greenInitiatives: Turi ku isonga mu gukoresha amabisi y’amashanyarazi ku nzira za Kigali–Musanze
points.digitalInnovation: Ikoranabuhanga rigezweho rituma habaho gukurikirana ingendo no kwishyura hatabayeho guhererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki

mission.title: Inshingano Zacu
mission.heading: Gutwara Abagenzi Neza kandi ku Giciro Kiboneye mu Rwanda Hose
mission.description: Inshingano zacu ni ugutanga serivisi z’itwara rusange zizewe zihuza imijyi n’ibyaro by’u Rwanda. Dutegekwa na RURA, dukorera ku nzira nyinshi ziva i Kigali zijya ahantu hatandukanye nka Musanze (aho Volcano National Park iherereye), Rubavu ku kiyaga cya Kivu, na Huye mu majyepfo, kugira ngo abagenzi, ba mukerarugendo n’imiryango bagere aho bajya neza kandi ku gihe.

safetyCompliance.title: Kubahiriza Umutekano wo mu Muhanda
safetyCompliance.description: Dukurikiza amabwiriza ya RTDA harimo kugenzura imitwaro n’isuzuma ry’umutekano risanzwe.

extensiveNetwork.title: Urusobe Rwagutse rw’Ingendo
extensiveNetwork.description: Dukorera mu ntara zose, tugatanga ingendo zigenwe zijya mu mijyi mikuru n’aho igihugu gihana imbibi n’abandi.

communityOriented.title: Dushingiye ku Muryango Nyarwanda
communityOriented.description: Ibiciro biboneye n’ubufatanye n’amakoperative y’abaturage kugira ngo ubwikorezi bugerweho na bose.

approach.title: Uburyo Dukoresha
approach.heading: Guhuza Ikoranabuhanga n’Ubutumwa bw’Ubushishozi bw’Abanyarwanda
approach.description: Duhuza ubunyamwuga n’ubushishozi bamenyereweho mu Rwanda n’udushya mu ikoranabuhanga. Amabisi yacu arenga 40 akoresha igenamigambi rishingiye ku makuru, rishingiye ku buryo bw’ubwikorezi bugezweho bwa Kigali, kugira ngo gahunda z’ingendo zibe nziza, kandi abakozi bacu batange serivisi inoze ishingiye ku muco w’Umuganda.

safetyFirst.title: Umutekano Uza Mbere
safetyFirst.description: Dukurikiza amategeko y’u Rwanda ku mutekano wo mu muhanda, dukora isuzuma ry’imodoka kenshi, dufite abatwara b’imodoka babihuguriwe kandi bakurikirana ingendo zose hifashishijwe GPS mu gihe nyacyo.

punctualService.title: Serivisi ku Gihe
punctualService.description: Gahunda z’ingendo zacu zateguwe hashingiwe ku mibereho y’itembera ry’imodoka mu Rwanda, kugira ngo amabisi ahaguruke ku gihe cyane cyane kuva muri Nyabugogo Bus Station i Kigali.

customerFocus.title: Kwita ku Bakiriya
customerFocus.description: Dutanga ubufasha amasaha 24 kuri 24 mu Kinyarwanda, Icyongereza n’Igifaransa, ndetse no mu mabisi amwe harimo intebe zoroheje n’Interineti (Wi-Fi).

sustainableInnovation.title: Udushya Turambye
sustainableInnovation.description: Turi ku isonga mu kugerageza amabisi y’amashanyarazi ku bufatanye n’imishinga y’ubwikorezi burengera ibidukikije mu Rwanda, tugabanya imyuka ihumanya ku nzira zikunze gukoreshwa.

whyChoose.heading: Impamvu Wahitamo Aby Ticket
whyChoose.description: Nk’isosiyete y’Abanyarwanda, twiyemeje guteza imbere urwego rw’ubwikorezi rusange binyuze mu mutekano, udushya, no guhuza igihugu cyose.

cta.heading: Witeguye Kuzenguruka u Rwanda?
cta.description: Jya mu mubare w’abagenzi ibihumbi banyuzwe bakoresha Aby Ticket kugira ngo bagere ahantu heza mu Rwanda, kuva mu mihanda y’i Kigali isusurutse kugeza ku misozi y’amayobera ya Musanze.

header.title: Ubwikorezi Buzuye
header.description: Uhereye ku kubika itike kuri interineti kugeza kuri serivisi za USSD zidafite interineti, dutanga ibisubizo byoroshye by’ubwikorezi ku buryo bwose bwifuzwa.

onlineBooking.title: Kubika Itike kuri Interineti
onlineBooking.subtitle: Kigali & Mu Gihugu Hose
onlineBooking.description: Bika amatike y’amabisi cyangwa imodoka kuri interineti ku ngendo zo muri Kigali no mu gihugu hose. Wishyure ukoresheje Mobile Money, amakarita cyangwa kohereza kuri konti ya banki.

interCityCar.title: Kubika Imodoka Zihuza Imijyi
interCityCar.subtitle: Hanze ya Kigali
interCityCar.description: Serivisi z’imodoka zoroheje zihuza Kigali n’imijyi mikuru nka Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, Rusizi, n’intara zose z’igihugu.
features: Serivisi iva ku rugo ijya ku rugo

carRental.title: Serivisi zo Gukodesha Imodoka
carRental.subtitle: Ku munsi no mu gihe kirekire
carRental.description: Kodesha imodoka zinoze ku mpamvu z’ubucuruzi cyangwa izo kwidagadura. Hitamo hagati ya sedan, SUV, cyangwa van — hamwe cyangwa hatarimo umushoferi.

ussdBooking.title: Kubika Itike ukoresheje USSD
ussdBooking.subtitle: Nta Interineti Ikenewe
ussdBooking.description: Bika itike udakoresheje interineti ukoresheje kode ya USSD *XXX#. Ibijyanye cyane n’ahantu hatagera interineti cyangwa kuri telefone zisanzwe.
features: Ikora kuri telefone iyo ari yo yose

realTimeTracking.title: Gukurikirana Ingendo mu Gihe Nyacyo
realTimeTracking.subtitle: GPS Irimo
realTimeTracking.description: Kurikira aho imodoka yawe iri mu gihe nyacyo. Menya igihe izagerera aho ujya kandi usangize amakuru y’urugendo n’umuryango wawe kugira ngo wumve umeze neza.
features: Amakuru ku gihe cyo kugera aho ujya

corporateSolutions.title: Ibisubizo by’Abafatanyabikorwa (Corporate)
corporateSolutions.subtitle: Ku Bigo n’Imiryango
corporateSolutions.description: Ibisubizo byateguriwe ibigo n’imiryango — harimo amasezerano y’ukwezi, imodoka z’abakozi, no gucunga imodoka z’ikigo ku buryo bwihariye.

testimonialsSection.title: Ibyo Abakiriya Bacu Bavuga
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Byizewe n’Abagenzi Ibihumbi mu Rwanda Hose

testimonials.name: Jean Claude Mugabo
testimonials.text: Serivisi nziza cyane! Nkoresha uburyo bwo kubika imodoka hagati y’imijyi buri cyumweru njya Musanze mu kazi. Bahora ku gihe kandi ari abahanga.

testimonials.name: Grace Uwase
testimonials.text: Uburyo bwo kubika ukoresheje USSD ni impinduka ikomeye. Nshobora kubika itike n’iyo ntari ku murongo wa interineti. Biroroshye cyane!

testimonials.name: Patrick Niyonzima
testimonials.text: Twakodesheje imodoka zabo kenshi ku ngendo zacu. Imodoka nziza, ibiciro byiza, kandi serivisi y’abakiriya ni isumba byose.

phone.title: Uduhamagare
phone.subtitle: Kuva ku wa Mbere kugeza ku Cyumweru kuva saa kumi n’ebyiri za mu gitondo kugeza saa yine z’ijoro

location.title: Sura Ibiro Byacu
location.subtitle: Tuzaze gusuhukana natwe ku biro byacu

map.title: Tubonere mu Rwanda
map.subtitle: Ibiro byacu biri i Kigali
map.iframeTitle: Ahari Ibiro bya Aby Ticket i Kigali, mu Rwanda

hero.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa (FAQ)
hero.description: Shakisha ibisubizo byihuse ku bijyanye no kubika amatike, kwishyura, ingendo, n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubwikorezi bw’amabisi mu gihugu hose.
hero.support: Niba uk still ushaka ubufasha, itsinda ryacu rishinzwe kwakira abakiriya ryiteguye kugufasha igihe cyose.

questions.question: Nabika nte itike y’imodoka kuri interineti?

answer.content: Kubika kuri interineti birihuse kandi byoroshye!

steps: Jya ku rupapuro rwo kubika kuri interineti (Online Booking).
Hitamo aho uva, aho ujya, n’itariki y’urugendo.
Hitamo bisi cyangwa icyiciro cy’intebe wifuza.
Wishyure ukoresheje Mobile Money, ikarita, cyangwa kohereza kuri konti ya banki.

answer.content: Itike yawe izahita yoherezwa kuri SMS cyangwa kuri email ako kanya.
Yego! Koresha serivisi yacu ya USSD — nta interineti ikenewe.
Hamagara *XXX#, ukurikize amabwiriza yo guhitamo inzira n’itariki, wemeze ubwishyu, hanyuma itike ikoherezwe kuri SMS ako kanya.

items: Ikora kuri telefone iyo ari yo yose

answer.content: Yego, birashoboka. Shyiramo amazina n’umubare wa telefone by’uwo muntu mu gihe ubika, hanyuma itike izoherezwa kuri SMS ye ako kanya.

questions.question: Namenya nte ko itike yanjye yemejwe?

answer.content: Nimara kwishyura, uzahita ubona SMS cyangwa email yemeza ko itike yawe yemejwe hamwe n’umubare w’icyemezo cy’urugendo.

questions.question: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura mwemera?

answer.content: Ushobora kwishyura mu mutekano ukoresheje:
Yego! Uburyo bwo kwishyura dukoresha burinzwe neza kandi bufite umutekano usesuye. Amakuru yawe yihariye n’ay’ubwishyu birindwa mu buryo bwizewe.
Yego, biterwa n’isosiyete y’ubwikorezi n’igihe cya gahunda yo guhaguruka.
Vugana n’itsinda ryacu ryita ku bakiriya ukoresheje umubare w’icyemezo cyawe, bazagufasha gukomeza inzira yo kubihindura.
Hashobora kubaho amafaranga y’inyongera mu gihe bisabye gukuraho itike hafi y’igihe cyo guhaguruka.

questions.question: Bizagenda bite niba nakererewe bisi yanjye?

answer.content: Niba utageze ku gihe, twihutire kutumenyesha.
Tuzagerageza kugufasha kubona indi gahunda niba hakiri umwanya (hashobora kubaho amafaranga make yo guhindura gahunda).
Oya, ntibikenewe! Erekana gusa itike yawe ya SMS cyangwa E-ticket igihe winjira muri bisi.

questions.question: Nkeneye kugera ku murongo saa ngapi mbere yo guhaguruka?

answer.content: Turagusaba kugera aho bisi ihagurukira nibura iminota 20–30 mbere, kugira ngo wiyandikishe kandi ubone intebe yawe neza.

questions.question: Nashobora guhitamo intebe ubwo mbika itike?

answer.content: Yego, ku ngendo zimwe ushobora guhitamo intebe mbere yo kwishyura kuri interineti.
Niba guhitamo intebe bitabonetse, abakozi bacu ku kigo bazakugenera imwe.

questions.question: Bizagenda bite niba bisi itinze guhaguruka?

answer.content: Tuzakumenyesha kuri SMS cyangwa duhamagare niba habaye gutinda.
Itsinda ryacu rikora uko rishoboye kugira ngo igihe cyo gutegereza kigabanuke kandi ingendo zikorwe ku gihe.
Umugenzi wese yemerewe isakoshi imwe isanzwe (ntirengeje 20kg) ndetse n’utundi tuntu duke ajyana mu modoka.
Imizigo y’inyongera ishobora kwishyurwa bitewe n’uburyo bw’umwanya.
Yego, ibyokurya byoroheje n’ibinyobwa biremewe — ariko tubasaba kubifata neza no gukomeza isuku muri bisi.
Rwose! Amabisi yacu ni agezweho, asukuye, afite AC, intebe ziryoshye, ndetse anatwarwa n’abashoferi babigize umwuga kugira ngo urugendo rwawe rube rwiza.

questions.question: Nabasha gute kuvugana n’itsinda ryita ku bakiriya?

answer.content: Ushobora kutugeraho mu buryo bworoshye ukoresheje:
Amasaha: 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM (Kuwa Mbere–Kuwa Cyumweru)

questions.question: Nabigenza nte niba nataye itike yanjye?

answer.content: Ntugire ikibazo — twandikire utubwire amazina n’umubare wa telefone, tuzaguhita twoherereza itike yawe nshya.

questions.question: Nshobora gute gutanga igitekerezo cyangwa gutanga ikirego?

answer.content: Dushima ibitekerezo byawe!
Ohereza email kuri feedback@abyticket.rw cyangwa utwandikire kuri WhatsApp kugira ngo dusangire uko wanyuzwe na serivisi zacu.

cta.title: Hari ibindi bibazo ufite?
cta.description: Itsinda ryacu rishinzwe kwakira abakiriya rirahari kugufasha iminsi 7 mu cyumweru.

hero.title: Uko Wabika Itike Yawe Neza kandi Byoroshye
hero.description: Kubika urugendo rwawe rukurikira mu Rwanda ntibyari byoroshye gutya! Dutanga uburyo bwinshi bworoshye bwo kubika — haba kuri interineti, kuri telefone, cyangwa uri mu rugendo.

steps.title: 1. Kubika Kuri Interineti
steps.subtitle: Byihuse, bifite umutekano, kandi bihari amasaha 24/7
list: Jya ku rubuga rwacu rwo kubika kuri interineti.
Hitamo aho uva, aho ujya, n’itariki y’urugendo.
Hitamo intebe cyangwa ubwoko bw’imodoka (bisi cyangwa imodoka).
Wishyure mu mutekano ukoresheje Mobile Money, ikarita, cyangwa kohereza kuri konti ya banki.
Wakira itike yawe (E-ticket) ako kanya kuri SMS cyangwa email.
features: Nta mpapuro zikenewe — erekana E-ticket yawe!

steps.title: 2. Kubika Ukoresheje USSD (Nta Interineti Ikenewe)
steps.subtitle: Bikwiriye cyane ahantu hatagera interineti neza
list: Kurikirana menu yo guhitamo inzira n’itariki y’urugendo.
Emeza kubika no kwishyura ukoresheje Mobile Money.
Wakira itike yawe ako kanya kuri SMS.

steps.title: 3. Ukeneye Urugendo Rwihariye?
list: Hitamo hagati ya sedans, SUVs, cyangwa vans ziryoshye.
Birahari hamwe n’umushoferi cyangwa udafite umushoferi.
Kwakirwa ku kibuga cy’indege no kuva ku rugo ukajya aho ujya birahari.
Wishyure mu mutekano kandi ukurikirane imodoka yawe mu gihe nyacyo.

steps.title: Ku Bigo n’Amatsinda
steps.description: Urashaka ubwikorezi bwizewe ku kigo cyawe? Dutanga ibisubizo byihariye ku bigo n’amatsinda, birimo:
list: Kubika ku buryo bwihutirwa no gutanga inyemezabwishyu

hero.title: Ubufasha & Inkunga
hero.description: Turi hano kugira ngo urugendo rwawe rube rworoshye kandi nta stress. Shakisha ibisubizo, vugana n’itsinda ryacu, cyangwa ubone ubufasha mu gihe nyacyo hasi hano.

answer.content: Ushobora kubika kuri interineti igihe icyo ari cyo cyose!

steps: Jya ku rubuga rwacu rwo kubika kuri interineti.
Wishyure ukoresheje Mobile Money, banki, cyangwa ikarita.
Wakira E-ticket yawe ako kanya kuri SMS cyangwa email.

answer.content: Yego! Hamagara *XXX# hanyuma ukurikize amabwiriza yo kubika ukoresheje USSD.
Uzakira itike yawe ako kanya nyuma yo kwishyura.

faqs.question: Ni ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura bwemerewe?

answer.content: Twemera:

faqs.question: Nashobora gukodesha imodoka cyangwa kubika imodoka hagati y’imijyi?

answer.content: Yego. Dutanga serivisi zo gukodesha imodoka (ku munsi cyangwa igihe kirekire) ndetse n’imodoka zihuza imijyi yose i Kigali — harimo Musanze, Rubavu, Huye, na Rusizi.
Ushobora gukurikirana imodoka cyangwa bisi mu gihe nyacyo ukoresheje GPS.
Wakira amakuru nyayo y’igihe cyo kugera kandi usangire amakuru y’urugendo n’umuryango wawe ku mutekano.

faqs.question: Nshobora guhindura cyangwa guhagarika kubika kwanjye?

answer.content: Yego, guhindura no guhagarika birashoboka bitewe n’ubwoko bw’itike yawe.
Vugana n’itsinda ryacu ryita ku bakiriya ukoresheje umubare w’icyemezo cyawe, bazagufasha.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.description: Ukeneye ubufasha ubu? Itsinda ryacu ry’inshuti rirahari kugira ngo rigufashe buri munsi.
contact.hours: Kuwa Mbere – Kuwa Cyumweru, 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM

items.title: Inyandiko z’Ubufasha
items.description: Amabwiriza y’intambwe ku ntambwe yo kubika, kwishyura, no gukurikirana urugendo

feedback.title: Ibitekerezo
feedback.description: Ibitekerezo byawe bidufasha kunoza serivisi! Ohereza ibitekerezo cyangwa utange amakuru y’ikibazo igihe icyo ari cyo cyose.

cookieConsent.title: Twubaha Ibanga Ryawe
cookieConsent.description: Dukoresha cookies kugira ngo turusheho kunoza uburyo ukoresha urubuga, tukwereke ibintu byihariye kandi tusesengure uko abantu basura urubuga. Uko ukanda "Emera Zose", uha uburenganzira bwo gukoresha cookies zacu.

necessary.title: Cookies Z’ingenzi
necessary.description: Ni ngombwa kugira ngo urubuga rukore neza. Ntizishobora kuzimwa.

analytics.title: Cookies zo Gusesengura
analytics.description: Zidufasha kumenya uko abashyitsi bakorana n’urubuga rwacu.

marketing.title: Cookies zo Kwamamaza
marketing.description: Zikoreshwa mu kugaragaza amatangazo yihariye akwiriye.
